Cleveland.Transfiguration Church (Cleveland, Ohio): Transfiguration (Polish: Parafia Przemienienia Pańskiego w Cleveland), was a Catholic parish church in Cleveland, Ohio and part of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Cleveland. It was located at the south-west corner of intersection of Broadway Ave. and Fullerton Ave., in a part of the South Broadway neighborhood previously known in Polish as Warszawa, also referred to today as Slavic Village.
